hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Decoupling During ETH/BTC Ratio Reversals
hypothesis_content.statement: When the ETH/BTC 7-day rolling correlation drops below 0.3 while the ETH/BTC price ratio forms a bullish divergence (lower lows in ratio vs higher lows in ETH price), select Ethereum ecosystem altcoins (GRT, CRV) will outperform both ETH and BTC by >15% over the next 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low correlation with divergence suggests ETH is developing independent strength not driven by BTC moves. This often precedes 'altcoin season' narratives where capital rotates from large caps to ecosystem plays, with GRT and CRV benefiting from renewed focus on Ethereum infrastructure.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC ratio makes lower low over past 10 days
ETH/USD makes higher low over same period

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5 days after entry or +20% return on altcoin position
